title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions: This new addition to Bulova’s legendary Marine Star Collection is a striking men’s 6-hand chronograph and calendar with exquisite style and exceptional functionality. The gold-tone stainless steel case features a black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents and a domed mineral crystal for extra durability, including 100m of water resistance. The dial is a striking black sunburst with gold-tone and silver-tone accents and luminescent hands and markers. This Marine Star watch features chronograph, 24-hour, and calendar displays on the dial, offering utility beyond traditional timepieces. The watch is paired with a matching gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with curved and faceted links and a sport foldover closure. Dare to adventure in luxury with this new men’s Bulova Marine Star timepiece.
